title: Screenshot Homophobic hater
body:
Hello,
I 've found in a game two premade players really toxic, and one of them started to have homophobic hate sentences. is there a way to send to RIOT the screenshot about that?

Thank you.

replies.body: The report after the game is enough. It works.
support section and send an email to riot with your screen!
hi, i don't found the right section for that

Because is not possible send screen for something happened in game. Just use the report system at the end of the game.

p.s. we are in the italian forum, please speak italian there or use the right board next time
